description:
The Geko aluminum deburring tool with a replaceable HSS M2 blade is a precise and reliable tool designed for edge finishing and removing burrs from various materials such as metal, plastic, wood, or acrylic. Its compact and lightweight design, made of durable aluminum, makes it handy and comfortable to use, even during prolonged work. The high-quality rotary blade made of high-speed steel HSS M2 ensures effective and quick burr removal, significantly improving the quality of work.


Product features:



  • Compact design made from durable aluminum

  • Replaceable rotary blade made of high-quality HSS M2 high-speed steel, offering long life and cutting efficiency

  • Ergonomic handle with a clip for easy portability and access to the tool at any time


Applications:


The aluminum deburring tool with a replaceable HSS M2 blade is ideal for precisely removing burrs from edges after cutting pipes, sheets, plastic parts, wood, or composite materials. It is indispensable in production plants, mechanical workshops, and in tasks related to plumbing and electrical installations. Thanks to the high-quality blade and durable construction, the deburring tool performs excellently in professional applications as well as in everyday DIY tasks.

description.name: Indoor Gas Heater 4.2 kW with reducer and hose type 2
description.long_desc:
A gas heater with a heating power of 4.2 kW is an efficient and versatile heating solution, ideal for warming larger spaces. Equipped with a ceramic heating element and three heat settings (1.5 kW, 2.8 kW, and 4.2 kW), this heater allows users to adjust heating intensity according to current needs, ensuring thermal comfort on colder days. The unit operates on a standard 11 kg propane/butane gas cylinder, and smaller cylinders can be used with a special adapter. The package includes a regulator and hose, allowing for immediate installation and use.


Technical Data





























































ModelDA-201
Type of gaspropane / butane
Device categoryI3 B/P
Supply Gas Pressure37 mbar
Gas Consumptionmax 305 g/h
Heat Power1,5 / 2,8 / 4,2 kW
Ignitionpiezoelectric
Pressure Reducertype 571F complies with EN 16129
Input Pressure0,3 - 16 bar
Outlet Pressure from the Reducer37 mbar
Reducer Capacity1,5 kg/h
Working Temperaturefrom -20°C to +50°C
Inlet ConnectorG1, G2, G4, G5, G7, G8, G10, G11, G12, G13
Outlet ConnectorH1, H4, H50, H51, H53

 Key Product Features:



  • High Heating Power up to 4.2 kW: Three heat settings (1.5 kW, 2.8 kW, 4.2 kW) provide precise temperature adjustment, enhancing user comfort.

  • Ceramic Heating Element: Ensures efficient heat distribution and long-lasting durability, enhancing the device's reliability.

  • Complete Ready-to-Use Set: Includes a regulator and hose for quick, safe installation and immediate connection to the gas cylinder.

  • Low Gas Consumption: Maximum gas usage is 305 g/h, making the heater an energy-efficient option during heavy use.

  • Safe Operation: The heater features a thermoelectric safety cut-off that automatically stops gas flow if the flame goes out, increasing user safety.

  • Convenient Swivel Wheels: Equipped with 5 swivel wheels, including one with a brake, allowing for easy movement and stable positioning.

  • Easy Assembly: Simple and quick assembly involves attaching the panels and base with six screws and then securing the wheels.


Example Applications:



  • Heating Large Rooms: Ideal for heating living rooms, offices, garages, or workshops, where quick and efficient heating is essential.

  • In Vacation Homes and Sheds: Perfect for warming seasonal spaces, providing comfortable relaxation even on cooler days.

  • In Workspaces and Workshops: With its mobility and high output, it’s excellent for heating larger work areas, especially those with significant space.

  • In Retail and Service Outlets: Perfect for shop owners, market stalls, and workshops looking to provide warmth during colder months.

  • During Renovation Work: Useful for construction or renovation tasks where a temporary and efficient heat source is needed.

description.name: MODERN-ELEGANT convector heater 2kW
description.long_desc:
The MODERN-ELEGANT convector heater with a power of 2000W is an excellent combination of modern design and efficiency. Its elegant, white casing and minimalist design make it a perfect addition to any interior, providing both a functional and aesthetic heating solution. The device offers three power levels (750W, 1250W, and 2000W), allowing you to adjust the heating intensity to current needs, which promotes energy savings and enhances user comfort. The heater is freestanding and portable, making it easy to move and position anywhere.


Technical Specifications:


Input Voltage: 230 AC


Frequency: ~50 HZ


Heating Power: 750 / 1250 / 2000 W


Control: manual


Mounting Type: freestanding


Heating Type: convection


Thermostat: yes


Recommended Area: 25m2


Protection Class: Class I


IP Protection: IPX0


Cable Length: 1.5 m


Net Weight: 2.3 kg


Key Product Features:



  • Three Heating Power Levels: Choose between 750W, 1250W, and 2000W to adjust the heating power to room size and individual user preferences, ensuring optimal temperature.

  • Built-In Thermostat: The thermostat automatically regulates the temperature, maintaining a stable heat level and saving energy.

  • Modern Design: Featuring an elegant white casing with a modern look, this heater blends seamlessly into any interior without disrupting the room's aesthetic.

  • Freestanding and Mobile: The freestanding design makes it easy to move, allowing you to place the heater where warmth is most needed.

  • Optimal Heating Range: Recommended for rooms up to 25m2, making it ideal for heating bedrooms, living rooms, offices, and other residential and commercial spaces.


Example Applications:



  • At Home and in Apartments: Perfect for additional heating in living rooms, bedrooms, kitchens, and any space where a quick warmth boost is desired.

  • In Offices and Workspaces: Provides fast and efficient heating for office spaces, improving work comfort during colder days.

  • In Vacation Homes: Ideal for heating seasonal spaces where traditional heating may be insufficient or impractical.

  • For Renovations or Construction Work: Quick to heat up, suitable for spaces requiring temporary temperature improvement during work.

description.name: Construction site extension cable 10m IP44
description.long_desc:
Durable cable with a cross-section of 3x2.5 mm² ensures safe power supply even under heavy loads, while the IP44 rating guarantees resistance to dust and water splashes – an ideal solution for outdoor and construction applications. Additional grounding enhances safety, and the rubber plug protects the socket from dirt and moisture, extending the product's durability.


Perfect for use on construction sites, workshops, gardening tasks, or connecting outdoor lighting. With a 10-meter cable length, you can comfortably use devices even in locations far from the power source.



  • Durable 3x2.5 mm² cable: Ensures lower voltage drop and higher overload resistance, making it excellent for intensive use.

  • 10-meter length: Provides flexibility to work even in areas distant from the power source.

  • IP44 rating: Effective protection against dust and water splashes – ideal for construction sites or outdoor use.

  • Rubber plug on the socket: Shields against moisture and dirt when the device is unplugged, prolonging the product’s lifespan.

  • Robust grounding: Increases safety when working with electrical devices.


Technical Specifications:



  • Brand: Keltin

  • Cable length: 10 meters

  • Cable cross-section: 3x2.5 mm²

  • Socket: 1 x 16A 230V~50Hz

  • IP rating: IP44

  • Color: Black

  • CE certification: Confirms compliance with European safety standards.

description.name: Electric extension cable with automatic reel and wall mount 15m + 1.5m
description.long_desc:
The Geko automatic retractable extension cord is the perfect solution for workshops, warehouses, production halls, or construction sites, as well as for garages and homes. With practical features and a durable design, it performs well in any situation where a flexible and reliable power source is needed.


Features:



  • Automatic cable retraction and locking: Save time and keep your workspace tidy with the automatic retraction mechanism. The built-in locking system allows you to stop the cable at the desired length – simple and practical!

  • Durable 15 m cable: The three-core cable with a cross-section of 3x1.5 mm² ensures stable and safe power supply, even for demanding devices. An additional 1.5-meter power cord provides more flexibility in connection.

  • Versatile mounting options: The swivel mounting bracket allows the extension cord to be fixed to a wall, ceiling, or post, making it easy to adapt to your workspace needs. The set also includes screws and wall plugs for convenient installation.

  • Plastic ball grip: A small yet practical addition, it facilitates pulling out the cable and prevents it from retracting accidentally.


Technical Specifications:



  • Manufacturer: Geko

  • Cable length: 15 m

  • Cable cross-section: 3x1.5 mm²

  • Power cord length: 1.5 m

  • Weight: 4.4 kg

The Geko automatic retractable extension cord has a protection class of IP20, meaning it is safeguarded against solid objects larger than 12.5 mm in diameter but is not resistant to moisture. This makes it an excellent choice for dry and clean working environments, such as workshops, warehouses, or garages.
description.short_desc:
The Geko automatic retractable extension cord is the perfect solution for workshops, warehouses, production halls, or construction sites, as well as for garages and homes. With practical features and a durable design, it performs well in any situation where a flexible and reliable power source is needed.


Features:



  • Automatic cable retraction and locking: Save time and keep your workspace tidy with the automatic retraction mechanism. The built-in locking system allows you to stop the cable at the desired length – simple and practical!

  • Durable 15 m cable: The three-core cable with a cross-section of 3x1.5 mm² ensures stable and safe power supply, even for demanding devices. An additional 1.5-meter power cord provides more flexibility in connection.

  • Versatile mounting options: The swivel mounting bracket allows the extension cord to be fixed to a wall, ceiling, or post, making it easy to adapt to your workspace needs. The set also includes screws and wall plugs for convenient installation.

  • Plastic ball grip: A small yet practical addition, it facilitates pulling out the cable and prevents it from retracting accidentally.

description.name: Air hose on reel 20m 8x12mm
description.long_desc:
Designed for performance and durability, it is perfect for both professional workshops and production lines. With a length of 20 meters, it provides freedom of work even in large spaces.



  • Durable PVC material – The hose is made of tough PVC material, resistant to mechanical damage and high pressure, ensuring long-lasting performance.

  • High working pressure – A maximum value of 250 psi allows for safe and efficient operation with most pneumatic devices.

  • Comfortable ball grip – A practical element that facilitates pulling the hose and prevents it from accidentally retracting into the reel.

  • Convenient mounting solution – The handle attached to the hose housing is designed to fit perfectly with the wall-mounted bracket. This allows you to quickly detach the hose with its reel and move it to another workspace.

  • Integrated reel – Enables neat storage of the hose and eliminates the problem of tangled cables, saving time and improving safety in the workplace.


Technical specifications:



  • Manufacturer: Geko

  • Hose length: 20 m

  • Hose diameter: 8 x 12 mm

  • Material: PVC

  • Working pressure: Up to 250 psi

  • Socket: 230V~50Hz

  • Connector: 1/4"

  • Handle dimensions: 3.5 x 13.5 cm

  • Mounting bracket dimensions: 8 x 22 cm

  • Weight: 6.26 kg

description.name: Masonry cord with handle 1.7mm 50m
description.long_desc:
Polypropylene Mason’s Line with Rotating Handle – Yellow, 50 m. A practical choice that combines durability and ease of use. Thanks to the rotating handle, working with it becomes exceptionally comfortable – less effort, more precision!
Durable material: The polypropylene line, with a diameter of 1.7 mm, is tear-resistant and does not easily wear out.
Practical length: The 50-meter line allows for easy marking of boundaries, regardless of project size.
Rotating handle: The 20 cm handle with a rotating function makes unwinding and rewinding the line fast and convenient – no tangling or frustration.
Bright color: The yellow shade of the line ensures excellent visibility, making it easier to mark straight lines or boundaries on construction sites.


Technical Specifications:



  • Manufacturer: Geko

  • Material: Polypropylene

  • Line diameter: 1.7 mm

  • Line length: 50 m

  • Handle length: 20 cm

  • Weight: 100 g

  • Color: Yellow


Applications:



  • Marking the boundaries of foundations or wall edges.

  • Setting straight lines for building fences or laying paving stones.

  • Defining plots or boundaries on construction sites.

description.name: Construction line 1.0mm 100m – yellow
description.long_desc:
Yellow Construction Line, 100 m, 1 mm. A practical tool for marking areas and accurately outlining straight lines – perfect support for building walls or erecting structures.
Durability and Strength: Made of robust nylon, this line features a round cross-section with a 1 mm diameter, ensuring high resistance to tension and accidental breakage.
Bright Visibility: The intensely yellow color makes the line highly visible, even over long distances or in low-light conditions.
Versatility: Suitable for both masonry and general-purpose tasks, helping to precisely mark areas or outline straight edges.
Optimal Length: The 100-meter length provides ample line to handle projects of various scales – from DIY tasks to larger construction jobs.

description.name: Hook and Loop Backing Pad 100mm M14 with Drill Adaptor
description.long_desc:
A 100 mm diameter hook and loop grinding disc designed for use with popular angle grinders equipped with an M14 thread. The set includes an adapter allowing it to be mounted on a drill. Also included is a sanding paper disc, so you can start working right away!


Key Product Features:




  • Disc Diameter: 100 mm – ideal for precision and medium-intensity tasks.




  • Mounting: Universal M14 thread – fits most angle grinders.




  • Hook and loop system – quick and convenient abrasive disc replacement.




  • Drill adapter included – compatible with drills with a 6 mm chuck.




  • Durable backing material – sturdy plate with a soft cushioning layer (red foam) for better surface conformity.




Set Includes:




  • 1 × hook and loop sanding disc – M14 mount, 100 mm diameter




  • 1 × drill adapter (external M14 thread › 6 mm shaft)




  • 1 × sanding paper disc




Applications:




  • Sanding of wood, metal, and plastics




  • Surface dulling and preparation for painting or varnishing




  • Workshop, automotive, renovation, and hobby projects

description.name: Profile forming pliers 210mm (80x35mm)
description.long_desc:
The Geko Profile Shaping Pliers are a sturdy and reliable tool designed for professionals and DIY enthusiasts working with sheet metal. With specially designed jaws measuring 80x35 mm, featuring anti-slip grooves, the tool ensures a firm grip and precise metal shaping. The ergonomic handles with an anti-slip coating provide comfort during extended use. These pliers are perfect for shaping metal profiles, bending edges, and finishing sheet metal elements in the roofing, ventilation, and construction industries.


Key product features:



  • 80x35 mm jaws – Perfect for precise processing of various metal profiles, allowing for accurate bending and edge shaping.

  • Anti-slip grooves – The pliers feature special grooves on the jaws that increase friction, preventing the sheet metal from slipping and ensuring a secure grip during work.

  • Ergonomic, anti-slip handle – The handle is coated with a rubber, anti-slip layer, providing comfort and safety even in challenging working conditions.

  • Durable construction – Made from high-quality steel, the tool guarantees durability and resistance to heavy use.


Examples of use:



  • Sheet metal work – Ideal for shaping edges and profiles in sheet metal during roofing work, ventilation system installation, or metal element production.

  • Automotive workshops – Useful for car body repairs and shaping metal profiles in vehicles.

  • Construction – The tool is useful when working with metal structures and bending sheet metal for various construction applications.

  • Hobby projects – Excellent for DIY enthusiasts who create decorative and functional metal elements.


Technical specifications:


Tool type: Profile shaping pliers


Total length: 210 mm


Jaw dimensions: 80x35 mm


Material: High-quality steel


Features: Anti-slip grooves on jaws, anti-slip handle

description.name: 3/4" 2 in 1 faucet valve screw extractor kit
description.long_desc:
The 3/4" extractor with tap is an essential tool for anyone needing to reliably and precisely remove damaged bolts or threads. Thanks to its solid construction and high-quality materials, such as 40Cr steel, it is durable and resistant to everyday workshop challenges.



  • Working range: M35-M50 – versatile, suitable for larger bolts and tasks requiring substantial force.

  • Material: 40Cr steel – exceptionally durable and corrosion-resistant, ensuring the tool’s longevity.

  • Hardness: HRC – provides the strength needed to handle even the most stubborn threads.


Technical Specifications:



  • Manufacturer: Geko

  • Extractor size: 3/4"

  • Thread range: M35 to M50 – designed for removing larger bolts and threads

  • Material: 40Cr steel – durable, corrosion-resistant, and built for intensive use

  • Hardness: HRC (Rockwell Hardness Scale) – ensures tool durability

  • Application: professional and home use

description.description:
Snow brush with an ice scraper for windows. A universal tool indispensable during winter. With the brush and scraper, you can quickly and conveniently remove snow from your car and clear frost or ice from the windshield. Made from durable plastic resistant to low temperatures. The brush features flexible bristles, ensuring no damage to your car’s paint.


Product features:



  • Made from durable plastic resistant to low temperatures

  • 2-in-1 – snow brush and ice scraper

  • Brush safe for car paint thanks to flexible bristles


Technical specifications:



  • Manufacturer: Geko

  • Material: plastic resistant to low temperatures

  • Total length: 52 cm

  • Scraper width: 9.5 cm

  • Brush length: 17 cm

  • Brush width: 1.5 cm

  • Bristle height: 6 cm

description.name: Snow brush with ice scraper – 44cm
description.long_desc:
Snow brush with an ice scraper for windows. A universal tool indispensable during winter, the brush and scraper allow you to quickly and conveniently clear snow off your car and remove frost or ice from the windshield. Made from durable plastic resistant to low temperatures. The brush is made of flexible bristles, so you don't have to worry about damaging your car's paint.


Product features:



  • Made from durable plastic resistant to low temperatures

  • 2-in-1 – snow brush and ice scraper

  • Brush safe for car paint thanks to flexible bristles

  • Soft foam handle provides a secure grip and comfort during use


Technical specifications:



  • Manufacturer: Geko

  • Material: plastic resistant to low temperatures

  • Total length: 44 cm

  • Scraper width: 8.5 cm

  • Brush length: 13 cm

  • Brush width: 2 cm

  • Bristle height: 6 cm
